entries.title: Agent Zero is the world's first AI SuperAgent
entries.summary:
Agent Zero is the world's first AI SuperAgent

It's free, 100% private, open source, highly customisable and VERY Powerful

In this 67 min video, you'll learn everything you need to know about Agent Zero https://t.co/Q3OZ0c75uU

entries.title: Meet SAM 3, a unified model that enables detection, segmentation, and tracking of objects across ima
entries.summary:
Meet SAM 3, a unified model that enables detection, segmentation, and tracking of objects across images and videos. SAM 3 introduces some of our most highly requested features like text and exemplar prompts to segment all objects of a target category.

entries.title: Claude Code‚Äôs CLI feels like a black box. I built a local UI to un-dumb it, and it unexpectedly blew up last week.
entries.summary:
https://reddit.com/link/1r90pol/video/30yd18c4qgkg1/player

Hey r/ClaudeAI,

Last weekend, I built a weekend project to scratch my own itch because I was going crazy with how much the official Claude Code CLI hides from us.

I shared it in a smaller sub (\[[original post](https://www.reddit.com/r/ClaudeCode/comments/1r3to9f/claude_codes_cli_feels_like_a_black_box_now_i/) in r/ClaudeCode here\]), and the response was insane‚Äîit hit #3 on Hacker News, got 700+ stars on GitHub, and crossed 3.7k down
